name: Colors:Zero
description:
Colors:Zero is an episodic interactive storytelling set in a world of noir. The story takes place in a world where colors have been erased. You will play as Walter Koch, a private investigator subject to mild mental disorder. You will investigate about strange murders in Shadeon City.

Features :

- Basic movements and different camera styles (obviously)
- Explore every place in 3D
- Cinematic cutscenes
- Inspect objects / Take items
- Full inventory access
- Interactive cutscenes
- Meet and talk to people
- Inspect crime scene (crime scene mode)
- Photo mode
- Interrogation
- Post-cognition mode (reconstruct crime scene)
- TheCase (node-based puzzle, investigation board)
- Deduction session
- Branching dialogues
- 6 different endings with variations
